name: Aero
tagline: The fastest web framework on the node platform.
body:
# Benchmark

![Webserver Benchmark](https://github.com/aerojs/aero/raw/master/docs/images/benchmark.png)

# Features

* Performance-focused web server
* Highly optimized page loading time
* Instantly see changes while developing
* ES 2015 support for client scripts
* HTML 5 validator runs after every change
* Follows [DRY](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Don%27t_repeat_yourself) like it's the bible
* Update your live server on every git commit
* All the good stuff: HTTP/2, IPv6, Web Manifest

# Contact

Aero is developed and maintained by [Eduard Urbach](https://blitzprog.org).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
